titleStmt.title: A reply by T.W. citizen of Chester, to a Vindication of Mr. M.H's Brief enquiry into the true nature of schism, from the exceptions of T.W. &c. By a person who conceals his name
titleStmt.author: T.W. citizen of Chester.

notesStmt.note: Quire E appears to have been imposed incorrectly; pages 38-39 precede pages 36-37, which precede pages 34-35.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
